name: Mellow Dream Demo
description:
Mellow Dream

Mellow Dream is a platformer and atmospheric game where you play as a lonely, curious cat that wants to explore the world by leaping through obstacles. Collect Light Orbs while taking in the atmospheric scenery.

Gameplay

Controls for Mellow Dream only consists of WASD and the SHIFT key, gameplay of Mellow Dream is inspired from the popular game Jump King.

A and D to move

W to charge jump /  jump / wall jump

S to drop from platforms

SHIFT to run

Demo

Mellow Dream is still in active development. This Demo aims to showcase the basic mechanic and art style of the game. Expect to see more atmospheric and minimal scenery in future versions.
